mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY caippl.pinglsj DESC) rownum, caippl.id, guk1.zhangh, CASE WHEN (guk1.weibm='未绑定' OR guk1.weibm='' OR guk1.weibm=null) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS bindWeib, CASE WHEN (guk1.qqh='未绑定' OR guk1.qqh='' OR guk1.qqh=null) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS bindQq, guk1.zongdccs, guk1.zongdcfs, guk1.zongdcje, caippl.pingj, caippl.pinglsj, caippl.pinglnr FROM caippl, caip AS caip1, guk AS guk1 WHERE (caippl.caip_id =caip1.id AND caippl.guk_id =guk1.id AND caippl.shifpb =0 AND caip1.id =#{caipId,jdbcType=CHAR}) ) a WHERE rownum>#{pageStart} AND rownum<#{pageEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO caippl (id, pinglsj, pinglnr, pingj, shifpb, cant_id, caip_id, guk_id) VALUES (newid(), getdate(), #{pinglnr}, #{pingj,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, 0, #{cantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{caipId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gukId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE caip SET pinglts =pinglts+1, pingjzcs =pingjzcs+1, haopcs =haopcs+1 WHERE id=#{caipId,jdbcType=CHAR}
UPDATE caip SET pinglts =pinglts+1, pingjzcs =pingjzcs+1, chapcs =chapcs+1 WHERE id=#{caipId,jdbcType=CHAR}
